scripts.babel: npx babel index.js >> index.babel.js && mv index.babel.js index.js
scripts.uglify: npx terser --compress --mangle --ie8 -- index.js >> index.terser.js && mv index.terser.js index.js
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run babel && npm run uglify
scripts.buildtest: npm run build && npm run test
